class.name: Container
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Holds a collection of language information.

constructor.param: The parent container or course of this container

class.property: A collection of titles for the container
An Array of pages within the container
The index of the current page
The index of the current sub container
The parent container or course of this container
The index of this container within it's parent's collection of containers
The collection of Language objects available to this container

method.name: addContainer
method.description: Adds a new container to this containers collection of sub containers.

method.name: addPage
method.description: Adds a page to this containers collection of pages, it will create a new page if an id is passed.
method.param: The page object or page id to add

method.name: getPrevSibling
method.description: Returns the previous sibling of this container in relation to it's parent

method.name: getNextSibling
method.description: Returns the next sibling of this container in relation to it's parent

method.name: getPage
method.description: Returns the given page by index and sets the currentPage property
method.param: The index of the page you want to get

method.name: getHasPages
method.description: Returns the True or false if the container contains pages

method.name: getPageCount
method.description: Returns the of pages held within this container

method.name: getPageByIndex
method.description: Returns the given page by index and does not set the currentPage property
method.param: The index of the page you want to get

method.name: getFirstPage
method.description: Returns the first page in this container

method.name: getNextPage
method.description: Returns the next page in this container based on the currentPage property

method.name: getPrevPage
method.description: Returns the previous page in this container based on the currentPage property

method.name: getStatus
method.description: Returns the viewed/completed status of this container as an integer: 0 not viewed, 1, started, 2 viewed

method.name: getPageStatus
method.description: Returns the viewed/completed status of all pages within this container as an Array of integers: 0 not viewed, 1, started, 2 viewed

method.name: getTitle
method.description: Returns the title of the container for the current course language.

method.name: toSimpleObject
method.description: Returns the container as a serialized POJO without methods only properties.
